english: They have written up his new novel .
chinese: 他们写文章赞扬他新出版的小说。

english: In his article he made bold with the facts .
chinese: 他在文章中任意篡改事实。

english: The reader is referred to the original paper .
chinese: 读者可参考原始的文章。

english: I have twenty essays to mark tonight .
chinese: 今晚我有二十篇文章要评分数。

english: I gave her article a quick look-through .
chinese: 她的文章我匆匆读过一遍。
文章造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: This passage is open to different interpretations ...
The article is compact and well organized .

chinese: 这篇文章作为批评来讲没有打中要害。
在现代的文章中这类例子不胜枚举。

english: Please write an abstract of this article .
chinese: 请写一份这文章的摘要。
这篇文章风格明快，内容充实。

english: The article is very important though it is short .
Yes, there were many unkind articles .
chinese: 是的，有很多不友好的文章。

english: His article contains much that is useful .
chinese: 他的文章里有很多有用的东西。

english: The article is compact and carefully constructed .
